history.proof: intros a b c H. unfold Rmax. destruct (Rle_dec b c). - hauto lq: on use: Rmult_le_compat_l inv: sumbool. - hauto use: Rmult_le_reg_l, Rmult_comm, Rmult_0_r unfold: Rle inv: sumbool.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros a b c H. unfold Rmax. destruct (Rle_dec b c). - rewrite Rmax_left. + rewrite Rmax_left. * reflexivity. * apply Rmult_le_compat_l. apply H. + apply Rmult_le_compat_l. apply H. - rewrite Rmax_right. + rewrite Rmax_right. * reflexivity. * apply Rmult_le_compat_l. apply H. + apply Rmult_le_compat_l. apply H.
